1: -module(ledger_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    3: -export([all/0,groups/0,node_run/1,is_ordered/1,init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
    4: 
    5: all()->[{group,session}].
    6: 
    7: groups()->[{session,[],[{group,nodes},is_ordered]},
    8:            {nodes,[],[node_run]}].
    9: 
   10: init_per_group(session,Config)->Config;
   11: init_per_group(nodes,Config)->
   12:     %% net_adm:ping('a@archlinux.fibertel.com.ar'),
   13:     timer:sleep(500),
   14:     ledger:start(),
   15:     Config.
   16: 
   17: end_per_group(session,_)->ok;
   18: end_per_group(nodes,_)->
   19:     ledger:stop(),
   20:     ok.
   21: 
   22: node_run(_)->
   23:     ledger:append(1).
   24: 
   25: is_ordered(_)->
   26:     [1,1]=ledger:get().
